name: Root Vegetable Puree
keywords: carrot, celery root, chicken broth, parsnip, spices, sweet potato, turnip, fall, winter, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 large celery root, peeled and finely chopped
2 cups chicken or vegetable broth, homemade or low-sodium canned

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Brush the carrots, parsnips, turnip and sweet potato with the olive oil and place the vegetables on a large baking sheet. Roast until tender, about 30-45 minutes, turning frequently. Set aside to cool.
Peel the sweet potato. Finely chop all of the roasted vegetables and transfer to a large saucepan.

Add the celery root, mace, nutmeg, thyme, broth and Sherry vinegar. Bring to a boil and simmer over medium heat for 15 minutes. Transfer to a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. Add the salt and pepper. Serve with the veal shanks.
